Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 07Th February 2026 Pursuant To Reg 30 And Other Applicable Provisions Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Considered and approved the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter ended December 31 2025 as recommended by Audit Committee in its meeting held today (Enclosed as Annexure A)

A)

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Pursuant To Regulation 29(1) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: Jinkushal Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve In compliance with the provision of Regulation 29 (1) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 as amended we hereby inform you that Meeting of the Board of Directors of Jinkushal Industries Limited will be held on Saturday 07th February 2026 at the registered office of the Company situated at H. No. 260 Ward No. 42 Opp. C. M. House Near Chhattisgarh Club Civil Lines Raipur Chattisgarh-492001 India inter-alia to consider and approve the unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (the Listing Regulations) we wish to inform that the management of the Company will have a physical meeting with investors/analysts on Friday  21st November 2025.

data.caption: Repeat Export Order Of 100 Units Of Hexl 420X Backhoe Loaders From North American Buyer - Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulation 15 and SEBI guidance on anonymization of counterparties Jinkushal Industries Limited (JKIPL or the Company ) notifies that Hexco Global FZCO a subsidiary company of JKIPL has secured a confirmed repeat export order from an existing B2B Customer based in North America The buyer a long standing partner and one of the early adopter of HexL machines was among the first international customer of the HexL brand and continues to be a key revenue contributor Within JKIPL global group operations.

data.caption: Update on board meeting

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: We wish you inform you that pursuant to (PIT) regulation 2015 code of conduct to regulate monitor and Report Trading by insider of the company (Jinkushal Industries limited) the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the company for all designated persons of the company and their immediate relatives shall remain close shall remail close from 19th October 2025 for the purpose of consideration of Unaudited standalone and consolidated Financial results of the Company quarter ended June 2025 and half year ended 30 sep 2025.

data.caption: RBI Extends Merchanting Trade Transaction (MTT) Cycle From Four To Six Months - A Positive Development For The CompanyS Export Operations
data.news_body: Jinkushal Industries limited has informed the exchange that RBI extends merchanting Trade Transaction (MTT) cycle from four to six month - a positive development for the Companys export operation.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Jinkushal Industries Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 03  2025 the equity shares of Jinkushal Industries Ltd (Scrip Code: 544547) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251001-70 dated October 01 2025.
